title: Mercury Transit in the 3rd House for Sagittarius Ascendant
summary: When Mercury transits the 3rd house for Sagittarius Ascendant, communication, courage, and mental agility increase. This phase boosts writing, speaking, marketing, and short-distance travel. You feel motivated to take initiatives, express ideas confidently, and engage with siblings or peers. Curiosity and multitasking rise, though scattered focus or impulsive words can reduce effectiveness. When directed with discipline, this transit supports skill-building, persuasive communication, and steady progress through consistent effort.
closing: This Mercury transit energizes communication and initiative. With focus, it supports skill growth, confident expression, and consistent progress.
